title: FSI for such facilities in this zone shall be up to 20% on gross area, underground structures along with kiosks shall not be counted towards FSI
clause_text: FSI for such facilities in this zone shall be up to 20% on gross area, underground structures along with kiosks shall not be counted towards FSI. NOC from Chief Controller of Explosives shall be necessary.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: FSI for such facilities in this zone shall be up to 20% on gross area, underground structures along with kiosks shall not be counted towards FSI.
